member.name: DISK_PARTITION_INFO.SizeOfPartitionInfo
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: DISK_PARTITION_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Mbr
member.summary: If PartitionStyle is PARTITION_STYLE_MBR (0), the union is a structure that contains information for a master boot record partition, which includes a disk signature and a checksum.

member.name: DISK_PARTITION_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Gpt
member.summary: If PartitionStyle is PARTITION_STYLE_GPT (1), the union is a structure that contains information for a GUID partition table partition, which includes a disk identifier (GUID).
